taskDescription: All aldoses exhibit mutarotation. For example, α-D-galactopyranose has [α]D = +150.7, and β-D-galactopyranose has [α]D = +52.8. If either anomer is dissolved in water and allowed to reach equilibrium, the specific rotation of the solution is +80.2. What are the percentages of each anomer at equilibrium? Draw the pyranose forms of both anomers.
